mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by m.medical_no desc) AS mno,m.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM medicalList WHERE medical_category='약' ) m ORDER BY mno
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by m.medical_no) AS mno,m.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM medicalList WHERE medical_category='검사' ) m ORDER BY mno DESC
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY v.vac_no) AS vno,v.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM vaccine ) v ORDER BY vno DESC
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY t.type_no) AS tno,t.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM petType ) t ORDER BY tno LIMIT #{pagenum}, #{contentnum};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medicalList SET medical_name=#{medical_name}, medical_price=#{medical_price}, medical_category=#{medical_category};
INSERT INTO vaccine SET vac_name=#{vac_name}, vac_price=#{vac_price}, vac_cycleY=#{vac_cycleY}, vac_cycleM=#{vac_cycleM}, vac_cycleW=#{vac_cycleW};
